io.sarl.lang

Class SARLVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.SARLVersion

  • public final class SARLVersion
extends Object
    Describes the specification of the SARL language.
    Since:
    0.3.0
    Version:
    0.5.7 2017-08-15 22:34:04
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.lang
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.lang.core

    • Field Detail

      • SPECIFICATION_RELEASE_VERSION

        public static final float SPECIFICATION_RELEASE_VERSION
        Version number of the SARL specification.

        The version number is usually composed of two digits that represent the version of the SARL specification and tools.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SPECIFICATION_RELEASE_VERSION_STRING

        public static final String SPECIFICATION_RELEASE_VERSION_STRING
        Version number of the SARL specification.

        The version number is usually composed of two digits that represent the version of the SARL specification and tools.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SARL_RELEASE_VERSION

        public static final String SARL_RELEASE_VERSION
        The version number of the current release of the SARL library.

        Usually, the two first digits are the same as the ones of SPECIFICATION_RELEASE_VERSION.

        See Also:
        SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_OSGI, SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_MAVEN, Constant Field Values

      • SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_OSGI

        public static final String SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_OSGI
        The version number in OSGI format of the current release of the SARL library.

        Usually, the two first digits are the same as the ones of SPECIFICATION_RELEASE_VERSION.

        See Also:
        SARL_RELEASE_VERSION, SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_MAVEN, Constant Field Values

      • SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_MAVEN

        public static final String SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_MAVEN
        The version number in Maven format of the current release of the SARL library.

        Usually, the two first digits are the same as the ones of SPECIFICATION_RELEASE_VERSION.

        See Also:
        SARL_RELEASE_VERSION, SARL_RELEASE_VERSION_OSGI, Constant Field Values

      • RELEASE_STATUS

        public static final String RELEASE_STATUS
        The status of the SARL specification.

        Usually, this status is also displayed in the reference documentation of SARL.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IS_STABLE

        public static final boolean IS_STABLE
        Flag that indicates if the current SARL libbrary is a stable release.

        A stable release is collection of libraries that will be not more compiled and generated.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MINIMAL_JDK_VERSION

        public static final String MINIMAL_JDK_VERSION
        The minimal JDK version to use SARL features.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final String MINIMAL_XTEXT_VERSION
        The minimal Xtext version to use SARL features.
